title: Pope Francis, visiting Greek razor wire-fenced migrant camp, challenges Europe to live up to its human rights ideals
content:
1. Pope Francis, visiting Greek razor wire-fenced migrant camp, challenges Europe to live up to its human rights ideals  The Washington Post
  2. Pope Francis warns of 'retreat from democracy' during Greece visit  New York Post
  3. Orthodox priest shouts 'Pope, you are a heretic' at Francis in Athens  Reuters
  4. Shipwreck of civilization: Pope comforts migrants on Lesbos  Associated Press
  5. Pope Francis returns to Lesbos, Greece and pleads for action on migrant crisis  NPR

localize.title: ギリシャの移民キャンプを訪れたフランシスコ法王は、ヨーロッパが人権の理想を実現することを求めました。
教皇方济各参观希腊用铁丝网围起来的移民营，挑战欧洲实现其人权理想的能力
教皇方濟各參觀希臘用鐵絲網圍起來的移民營，挑戰歐洲實現其人權理想的能力
